name: Square Off Against Bullets
description:
A simple game about dodging waves of bullets.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Escape - Escape (or softlock yourself if you play in-browser [and you probably are], I don't know why you would do that but you have the choice and I respect your playstyle even if the playstyle is not playing the game at all)

Warning:

I made this game in like 3-4 days. I will not take any responsibilities for any injuries caused by the fact that it can be rough around the edges.

Game made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022.
